author: Malavida.com
title: Sygic: GPS Navigation 16.4.10 English Android
text:
On-screen 3D animations of cities and country views. Large number of interactive TomTom maps of countries all over the world. Get to know the state of the traffic in real time . Includes Dynamic Lane Guidance. Create, edit and save advanced routes with reference points. Don't ever get lost 
Sygic: GPS Navigation is one of the best GPS for Android seen to the date. Its 3D representation makes it much easier for the driver to keep his/her orientation, and the maps can be updated for free . By means of a subscription system it's also possible to obtain real-time information about the traffic and incidents that you yourself will be able to notify. 
Type in your destination in Sygic: GPS Navigation and reach it with the instructions you'll receive from this GPS in app format for your Android phone or tablet . Requirements and additional information: Requires Android 4.0.3 or above. The space required depends on the device on which it's installed. This free version has certain limitations. The installation of the app by means of the APK file requires the activation of the "Unknown sources" option within Settings>Applications. Offers in-app purchases.
